price: Wͻde mma mmaa susu Nyankopͻn. Kronkron Hene ne no. Deε wͻn akoma pε no na εwͻ wͻn.
arabic: وَيَجۡعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡبَنَٰتِ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَلَهُم مَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayajʿalūna lillahi al-banāti sub'ḥānahu walahum mā yashtahūna
